name: Chaos Ways
description:
There is chaos in the paths.. solve the puzzles

Solve the puzzle and create path by rotating the tiles and avoid chaos

Controls : 

Web/ Desktop : Click on tiles

Android : TAP on on tiles 

Details

Developed by @ParuthidotExE

Game Engine : GODOT

3D art : Blender

2D Textures : Paint.net

UI art and Audio : not created during jam [and  only coding for ui created during this jam ]
